code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Box,Button,Text}from"@chakra-ui/react";import Cookies from'js-cookie';import{motion}from'framer-motion';import honeyBadgerSprite upgradeLocation=()=>{if(hackerspaces>=3){setHackerspaces(hackerspaces-3);if(location==='basement')setLocation('garage');else if(location==='garage')setLocation('home lab');else if(location==='home lab')setLocation('hackerspace');else
